releaseNotes:
Auto-generated from commit: feat: implement tap-to-select and tap-to-move for mobile gameplay

- Add handleTapWaste, handleTapTableau, handleTapEmptyTableau, handleTapFoundation handlers
- Connect onClick to all interactive cards with proper callbacks
- Add visual selection feedback (highlighted border + shadow)
- Update game instructions for mobile users (tap to select, tap to move)
- Use CSS variables for responsive card sizing
- First tap selects card, second tap moves to destination
- Deselect by tapping same card again
